participant_1.background:
I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.
I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
I'd brag about my ability to stay humble and grounded even when I'm on top of the world.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

participant_2.background:
I like to share my time and company with others.
I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me.
I enjoy spending time with my family, even if we have different interests.
My biggest challenge was overcoming my eating disorder.
I am of average weight.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1, nice to meet you.
Hello, I'm participant_2, nice to meet you too.
I'm a violinist, and I enjoy working out and staying active.
That's really cool! I enjoy spending time with my family and helping my mom out.
I'm also a hard worker. I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
That's great! I'm proud of you for overcoming your eating disorder.
Thank you! I try my best.
What's your biggest challenge?
I love to procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.
That's a good challenge! I enjoy spending time with my family, even if we have different interests.
It is! I love my pets. What are your hobbies?
I like to read, go for walks, and watch movies.
I like reading too! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Little Prince. What's yours?
My favorite book is Harry Potter.
I've heard good things about Harry Potter! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great series.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad we met!
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
You too!
